metadata.title: CVE-2020-13132 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Yubico libykpiv before 2.1.0. An attacker cantrigger an incorrect free() in the ykpiv_util_generate_key() function inlib/util.c through incorrect error handling code. This could be used tocause a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: yubico-piv-tool package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
